thread.title: Mandarin Oriental, Miami Launches New Home And Design ToursTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Mandarin Oriental, Miami Launches New Home And Design ToursTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Mandarin Oriental, Miami Launches New Home And Design ToursTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Mandarin Oriental, Miami Launches New Home And Design Tours Published on : Thursday, October 1, 2015
Located close to the ultra-stylish neighborhoods of Wynwood and the Miami Design District, the triple Five-Star Mandarin Oriental, Miami launches the Shop with a Designer package offering personalized home and design tours to Miami’s under-the radar shops and upscale boutiques. Celebrity designer and style editor Courtney Cachet will tailor each tour to guests’ personal style including visits to the city’s top art galleries, exclusive antiques dealers, an amazing atelier for custom-built furniture or an outing to interior design showrooms and furniture stores.
Guests may specify one or more themes they prefer to experience or draw a “Cachet Choice” card, which allows them to discover a surprise hodgepodge of Miami shops, ateliers and artisans curated by Cachet based on their needs. Cachet will consult with each guest before arrival to assess their interests and personal taste.
The Shop with a Designer package is priced from USD 1,950 and includes:
Accommodations for two nights
Daily American breakfast for two
Half-day guided tour of Wynwood and the Miami Design District with celebrity designer Courtney Cachet and chauffeured transportation
Source:-Mandarin Oriental
